Bandwidth¶

Module for Bandwidth class.

This module is used to estimate the bandwidth parameter that is necessary in the case of kernel regression.

class FDApy.bandwidth.Bandwidth(t0=0.5, k0=2)¶

An object to define a bandwidth for the smoothing.

Parameters

  • t0 (list of float) – A list of sampling points

  • k0 (list of int) – A list of neighborhood

  • H (list of float) – A list of Hurst parameters

  • L (list of float) – A list of constant

b¶

Estimation of the bandwidth for each t0

Type

list of float

estimate_H(data, sigma=None)¶

Perform an estimation of \(H_0\).

estimate_L(data, H0=None, sigma=None, density=False)¶

Perform an estimation of \(L_0\).

estimate_bandwidth(data, H0=None, L0=None, sigma=None)¶

Perform an estimation of the bandwidth.

Parameters

  • data (FunctionalData) –

  • H0 (list of float, default=None) – An estimation of H0

  • L0 (list of float, default=None) – An estimation of L0

  • sigma (float, default:None) – An estimation of the standard deviation of the noise

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_H0(data, t0, k0, sigma=None)¶

Perform an estimation of \(H_0\).

Parameters

  • data (FunctionalData) – An element of the class IrregularFunctionalData

  • t0 (float) – Time to estimate H0

  • k0 (int) – Considered neighborhood

  • sigma (float, default=None) – Estimation of the standard deviation of the noise

Returns

Return type

An estimation of H0.

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_H0_list(data, t0, k0, sigma=None)¶

Perform an estimation of \(H_0\) in case t0 is a list.

Parameters

  • data (FunctionalData) –

  • t0 (list of float) – Times to estimate H0

  • k0 (int) – Neighborhood to consider

  • sigma (float, default:None) – An estimation of the standard deviation of the noise

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_L0(data, t0, k0, H0, sigma=None, density=False)¶

Perform an estimation of \(L_0\).

Parameters

data (FunctionalData) –

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_L0_list(data, t0, k0, H0, sigma=None, density=False)¶

Perform an estimation of \(L_0\) in case t0 is a list.

Parameters

  • data (FunctionalData) – An object that represents functional data

  • t0 (list of float) – Times to estimate H0

  • k0 (int) – Neighborhood to consider

  • H0 (list of float) – An estimation of H0 at t0

  • sigma (float, default:None) – An estimation of the standard deviation of the noise

  • density (boolean, default=False) – Do the density of the sampling points follow a uniform distribution

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_bandwidth(data, H0, L0, sigma, K='epanechnikov')¶

Perform an estimation of the bandwidth.

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_bandwidth_list(data, H0, L0, sigma, K='epanechnikov')¶

Perform an estimation of the bandwidth.

Perform an estimation of the bandwidth in case \(H_0\) and \(L_0\) are lists.

FDApy.bandwidth.estimate_mu(data)¶

Perform an estimation of the mean number of sampling points.

Parameters

data (FunctionalData) – An element of the class IrregularFunctionalData
